title: Gerald Stern, Poet of Wistfulness, Anger and Humor, Dies at 97
description: Mr. Stern, who drew on his own upbringing and the death of his sister, began writing late in life and earned the 1998 National Book Award, among other accolades.
dc:creator: Neil Genzlinger
category: This Time: New and Selected Poems (Book)

media:content.media:credit: Frank C. Dougherty for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Gerald Stern in 1999. His first published poem, “The Pineys,” appeared when he was 44.
